attributes.action: AWARD A KNIGHTHOOD TO THE CHAIRMAN AND MANAGER OF BURNLEY FC
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Barry kilby started the revolution at Burnley Football Club 8 years ago and with the inspired appointment of Owen Coyle last year Burnley are now in their rightful and deserved place amongst the footballing elite. Burnley FC's promotion has the potential to be a huge economic stimulus to the local economy in Burnley,Pendle and Rossendale.In light of this achievement we ask the Prime Minister to consider recommending to Her Majesty the Queen that Barry kilby and Owen Coyle be knighted for services to Football.

rejection.details: The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours from the public. Please go to http://www.direct.gov.uk/honours
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
